verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
And I'm so happy, so very happy,
I've got the love of Jesus in my heart,

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
And I'm so happy, so very happy,
I've got the love of Jesus in my heart.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
I've got the joy, joy, joy, joy,
Down in my heart, down in my heart,

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Down in my heart.
I've got the joy, joy, joy, joy,
Down in my heart,
Down in my heart to stay.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
I have the peace
That passeth understanding
Down in my heart, down in my heart,
Down in my heart.

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
I have the peace
That passeth understanding
Down in my heart,
Down in my heart to stay.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
I have the love of Jesus,
Love of Jesus, down in my heart,
Down in my heart, down in my heart.

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
I have the love of Jesus,
Love of Jesus, down in my heart,
Down in my heart to stay.

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
I've got the wonderful love,
Of my blessed Redeemer,
Way down in the depths of my heart,
Way down in the depths of my heart.

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
Way down in the depths of my heart.
I've got the wonderful love,
Of my blessed Redeemer,
Way down in the depths of my heart,
Way down in the depths of my heart to stay.

verse.name: v5a
verse.lines:
For there is therefore now no condemnation,
Down in my heart,
Down in my heart, down in my heart,

verse.name: v5b
verse.lines:
For there is therefore now no condemnation,
Down in my heart,
Down in my heart today.
